page.title: 07Weeton Toddlers'/Play Group
page.content:
The Weeton village{Mothers' and {Toddlers' Group,}formed in 1984, was the idea of the vicar's wife. It began with five children and their mothers meeting twice a week in the village hall. Now 17 adults and 20 children meet twice a month.
The children move later into the {Playgroup,}which meets every Friday afternoon in the village school. At present there are l6 children.
The groups meet a real social need and are much appreciated by the parents, the Toddlers' Group in particular providing a welcome meeting place for the mothers.
